Package co.edu.unbosque.model.persistencia

Class CandidateDAO

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.model.persistencia.CandidateDAO
public class CandidateDAO extends Object
CandidateDAO class is the Data Access Object in charge of performing CRUD operations on the list of candidates.

  • Constructor Details

    • CandidateDAO

      public CandidateDAO(CandidateFile archivo)
      Constructor of the CandidateDAO class. Creates a CandidateFile object that will be used on CRUD operations.
      Parameters:
      archivo - CandidateFile object that reads and writes on the candidate file.

  • Method Details

    • searchCandidate

      public CandidateDTO searchCandidate(String cedula, ArrayList<CandidateDTO> candidatos)
      Performs a search for candidates in the list, using their unique ID number.
      Parameters:
      cedula - ID number that will be used to perform the search
      candidatos - list of candidates to search
      Returns:
      an object with the information of the found candidate. In case it cannot find a matching ID number, it will return an empty object.

    • addCandidate

      public boolean addCandidate(String nombre, String apellido, String cargo, String cedula, int edad, ArrayList<CandidateDTO> lst)
      Adds a new candidate to the list, as well as writing it into the candidates' file.
      Parameters:
      nombre - name of the new candidate
      apellido - last name of the new candidate
      cargo - current position of the new candidate
      cedula - ID number of the new candidate
      edad - age of the new candidate
      lst - list of candidates
      Returns:
      true-or-false value on whether the candidate has been succesfully added or not.

    • deleteCandidate

      public void deleteCandidate(String cedula, ArrayList<CandidateDTO> lst)
      Deletes the candidate with a matching ID number from input.
      Parameters:
      cedula - ID number of the candidate to delete
      lst - list of candidates

    • updateCandidate

      public void updateCandidate(String newname, String newlast, String id, String newpos, int newage, ArrayList<CandidateDTO> lst)
      Updates all the information of a candidate with a matching ID number.
      Parameters:
      newname - new name for the candidate
      newlast - new last name for the candidate
      id - unique ID number for a candidate
      newpos - new position of the candidate
      newage - new age of the candidate
      lst - list of candidates
